title: Stir Crazy Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Busy coffee shop and lunch spot on the north side in the Bellevue neighborhood. Keeps on hand almond, soy, and coconut milk for coffee drinks. Vegans could get bagel with hummus, salad, a hummus and veggie wrap, plus a few other menu items which can be modify to be vegan. The atmosphere is eclectic with local artwork display and live music Thursday nights.
